concept.title: Blackbaud Merchant Services
concept.shortdesc: Streamline financial transaction management so you can focus more of your valuable time and energy on your mission.

conbody.p: Developed by payment experts for nonprofits just like yours, Blackbaud Merchant Services is designed to make payment processing simple, secure, and affordable.

ul.li: Both a credit card gateway and processor, you benefit from the convenience and protection that comes from working with a single provider
Easily process credit card and ACH (direct debit) transactions with integration to other Blackbaud solutions
Receive funds when you need them with daily disbursements*
It takes just minutes to set up, and you have access to real-time transaction information and reports.
